The effect of ticks on running speed of lizards An implementation in R Markdown Chapter 1 Before session

The effect of ticks on running speed of lizards An implementation in R Markdown Kris Wilde and Anthony Davidson 2019-08-17 Chapter 1 Before session Have a go at loading and running the files (.rmd) here. To begin with you will need the following packages: # install.packages("car") # car # compute.es # effects # ggplot2 # multcomp # pastecs # WRS2
